Welcome to our page for the Parent Council!

Our Parent Council are in regular communication with the School’s leadership team offering constructive criticism about school policy, systems, communication and events. We pride ourselves on being a ‘listening school’ who take an active role in forging superb links with children and their families.

 

Meet the Parent Council!

Kristianne Thorogood- Link to GB (Children in Y6/Y4/F2)

Tracey Beaumont- Link to GB (Child in Y4)

Laura Grosvenor (Child in Y5)

Gina Robinson (Child in Y4)

Helen Turner (Children in Y6/Y5/Y1)

Lynsey Waring (Children in Y5/Y3/Y1)

Michelle Johnson (Children in Y4/Y2)

(All classes/ages represented except Nursery)

 

We will meet formally at least once per year and the minutes for each meeting- including next steps- will be shared on this page! We email regularly and I seek feedback on a range of subjects each term.

We are always open to new members joining the group…please email Mr McClure or catch one of the parents listed above if you are interested!

Just like our School Council system…if you have some feedback that isn’t urgent or about your own child specifically then feel free to share it with your Parent Council rep(s).

 

Next Meeting Date and Time:

TBC January/February 2020

 

Meeting Records:
